items.text_for_match: Taylor says he was true to role during Kelly argument Liverpool manager Gareth Taylor says he "true to my role" when dealing with disagreements with England forward Chloe Kelly in his previous job. Liverpool manager Gareth Taylor says he "true to my role" when dealing with disagreements with England forward Chloe Kelly in his previous job.

items.ja: Diarra seeks £56m from Fifa in legal action
items.en: Diarra seeks £56m from Fifa in legal action
items.text_for_match: Diarra seeks £56m from Fifa in legal action Former France midfielder Lassana Diarra is restarting legal proceedings seeking £56m in compensation from Fifa and the Royal Belgian Football Association. Former France midfielder Lassana Diarra is restarting legal proceedings seeking £56m in compensation from Fifa and the Royal Belgian Football Association.

items.ja: Why has the Man City 115 charges case taken so long?
items.en: Why has the Man City 115 charges case taken so long?
items.text_for_match: Why has the Man City 115 charges case taken so long? BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains why the legal case between Man City and the Premier League is ongoing. items.ja: From farming village to Liverpool icon - the Salah story
items.en: From farming village to Liverpool icon - the Salah story
items.text_for_match: From farming village to Liverpool icon - the Salah story BBC Sport visits Egypt to discover what Mohamed Salah means to the people of the football-mad country, and how a small boy from humble beginnings became a national icon. BBC Sport visits Egypt to discover what Mohamed Salah means to the people of the football-mad country, and how a small boy from humble beginnings became a national icon.
